subject: Hockey, Ice
Coaches and Managers
lead_paragraph: After Claude Julien was abruptly fired by the Devils in 2007, he wondered whether he would ever get another chance in the N.H.L. Now, he leads the league’s top team into the playoffs.
snippet: After Claude Julien was abruptly fired by the Devils in 2007, he wondered whether he would ever get another chance in the N.H.L. Now, he leads the league’s top team into the playoffs.
